data.title: Sebastian Junger Author Talk
data.meta_description: Register on Humanitix - Sebastian Junger Author Talk hosted by Greater Pittsburgh Festival of Books. Pittsburgh Theological Seminary, 616 N Highland Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15206, USA. Saturday May 11th 2024. Find event information.
data.text:
Sebastian Junger

Moderated by Steven Drummond|Â Building: Chapel | Room: Sanctuary | 11:15 AM - 12:15 PM

After the presentation, the author will be signing books in the lobby of the Chapel Auditorium.Â

Their books will be available at the bookstore in the lobby of the Chapel Auditorium

Book Bundle tickets are now available!Â Â
